special_cp.overview: Smeargle's has 487 max CP (at Level 50). A Smeargle obtained from Raids can be encountered from 214 CP to 246 CP, or if weather boosted, in the 268 CP to 308 CP range. In Field and Special Research, Smeargle can be found in the 161 CP to 184 CP range.
more_info: Field and Special Research encounters are always Level 15. IVs range from 10 (min) to 15 (max). Field Research encounters have a 10/10/10 IV floor.

Raid Bosses caught with weather boost are always Level 25. IVs range from 10 (min) to 15 (max). Weather boosted Raid Catches have a 10/10/10 IV floor. üòà Shadow Pok√©mon have 6/6/6 IV floor in raids.
üòà Shadow Pok√©mon have 6/6/6 IV floor in raids.
Wild encounters range from Level 1 to Level 30 Pok√©mon. Their IVs range from 0 (min) to 15 (max) for each stat.

Weather Boosted wild Pok√©mon encounters get a 5 Level boost, bringing their Level range to Level 6 to Level 35. In addition, they have a guaraneed minimum IV value of 4 for each stat, resulting in a 4/4/4 IV floor.

meta_analysis: Smeargle in the meta PvE Analysis Smeargle is a unique Pok√©mon. It copies the moveset of the species it photobombs, making it the Pok√©mon with the most diverse movepool in the game. However, even with the best moves, it‚Äôs useless due to its mere 40 Attack stat and 83 Defense (the 146 Stamina doesn‚Äôt make any difference). ü´£ü´£ü´£ This Pok√©mon is just a collectible . mega_boost.intro_text: A list of Mega Pok√©mon that boost Smeargle's Normal-type moves, Candy, and Candy XL from catching Smeargle.

bonus_info.raid_bonus: Mega and Primal Raid Bonus ‚Äì Mega Pok√©mon boost the attack power of all other Pok√©mon when battling in Raid Battles by 10%. Attacks that share their type with the Mega Pok√©mon's type(s) receive a 30% boost. However, these bonuses do not stack if there are multiple Mega-Evolved Pok√©mon battling simultaneously; only the higher boost will be applied.
bonus_info.catch_bonus: Mega and Primal Catch Bonus ‚Äì While a Pok√©mon is Mega-Evolved, additional XP and Candy is granted when catching a Pok√©mon that shares a type with it, or for any raid boss caught. These do not stack with each other. Additionally, High and Max Level Mega-Evolved Pok√©mon grant an increased chance to obtain Candy XL when catching a Pok√©mon that shares a type with it.

size_info.description: Smeargle's height ranges from 0.58 m to 2.08 m, with the average being 1.19 m. The illustration shows a comparison with a 1.70 m (5‚Ä≤07‚Ä≥) tall Trainer. Max height has been limited to 450px for rendering purposes.

pokedex.entry: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.
Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

It draws symbols all over the place to mark its territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls are covered in graffiti.

It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol, Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
